E1011.meaning: Communication error between the indoor and outdoor unit (when indoor unit cannot receive signals)
E1011.solution: Check COMM KIT and outdoor unit connections

E1091.meaning: Communication error due to indoor unit address incomplete

E1111.meaning: Modbus communication error (when COMM KIT cannot receive signals)

E2011.meaning: COMM KIT/OUTDOOR UNIT communication error (matching error)
E2011.solution: Check compatibility of COMM KIT and outdoor unit

E2021.meaning: COMM KIT/OUTDOOR UNIT communication error (3 min)

E2031.meaning: Communication error between INVERTER and MAIN MICOM (6 min)
E2031.solution: Inspect inverter and main micom connections

E2211.solution: Check and replace outdoor unit temperature sensor

E2311.solution: Inspect and replace condenser temperature sensor

E2511.solution: Check discharge temperature sensor and connections

E4031.meaning: Detection of OUTDOOR UNIT compressor freezing (during cooling operation)
E4031.solution: Inspect outdoor unit for ice buildup

E4041.meaning: Protection of OUTDOOR UNIT when it is overload (during Safety start, Normal operation state)

E4071.meaning: Comp down due to high pressure

E4162.solution: Allow compressor to cool and check for blockages

E4252.meaning: Power source line missing error (only for 3-phase models)

E4401.solution: Wait for outdoor temperature to drop

E4411.solution: Wait for outdoor temperature to rise

E4622.meaning: [Inverter] Total current error/PFC over current error
E4622.solution: Check current flow and PFC settings

E4632.solution: Allow OLP to cool and check for blockages

E4661.solution: Inspect DC link connections and voltage levels

E4692.solution: Check DC link voltage sensor connections

E4713.meaning: Outdoor unit EEPROM Read/Write error (OTP error)

E4741.meaning: IPM(IGBT Module) or PFCM temperature sensor error

E4831.solution: Inspect DC link connections and voltage levels

E4882.solution: Check AC input voltage sensor connections

E5002.solution: Allow IPM to cool and check for blockages

E5542.solution: Inspect for gas leaks and repair

E9061.solution: Check refrigerant gas inlet temperature sensor

E9114.solution: Check flow switch and ensure it is operational
